summary: Set in Algeria in the 1920s, a rabbi's cat who learns how to speak after swallowing the family parrot expresses his desire to convert to Judaism.
cast: Mathieu Amalric|Hafsia Herzi|François Damiens|Wojciech Pszoniak|Eric Elmosnino|Karina Testa|Jean-Pierre Kalfon|Joann Sfar|Daniel Cohen|Maurice Bénichou|François Morel|Alice Houri|Mohamed Fellag|Pascal N'Zonzi|Olivier Broche|Sava Lolov|Laurent Lévy|David Rit|Djanis Bouzyani|Jean-Claude Frissung|Didier Brice|Jean-Pierre Amiel|Marguerite Abouet|Laurentine Milebo|John Pucc|Anita Gabay|Sophie Bikart|Siham Gharnit
title: El gato del rabino
